title: Slow speeds from 4G and Wifi
content:
Hi, 

I am getting slow speeds on my Pixel 3 for 4G and Wifi. 
I have used Speedtest by Ookla on both my Samsung and Pixel Phones and get very different speeds. 
On wifi my Samsung S6 Edge i get 100Mbs but my PIxel 3 only gets 16Mbs - both using the same access point (honme router) 
On 4G my Samsung S6 Edge i get 42Mbs but my Pixel only gets 9.7Mbs - both on the same Network (different sim cards)

I have tried to reset the network etc and rebooted the phones. 

Any suggestions ?
